ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | expcld.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | mulexpd.2 | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | #P_sqmul | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( A x. B ) ^ 2 ) = ( ( A ^ 2 ) x. ( B ^ 2 ) ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( A x. B ) ^ 2 ) = ( ( A ^ 2 ) x. ( B ^ 2 ) ) ) |
